item.title: Can A Mortgage Loan Modification Help You Avoid Foreclosure?
item.description: WHAT IS MORTGAGE MODIFICATION? A mortgage loan modification changes the terms of your loan with the main goal being to lower your payment and make them more affordable. This may be achieved by lowering the interest rate or changing your rate from adjustable to fixed.

item.title: Hong Kong property investment dives in Q3 as Asia Pacific markets moderate
item.description: The Hong Kong protests hit the financial hub’s commercial real estate investment during the third quarter of 2019, with transaction volumes falling 32% year-on-year to US$2.7bn, according to Real Capital Analytics.

item.title: MSCI生效 台股將爆量
